eventDecorators.name: NewAppProxy
eventDecorators.description: Validator's status changed. Event emitted for each executed trade.

eventDecorators.name: RecoverToVault
eventDecorators.description: Validator's status changed. Event emitted for each executed trade.

eventDecorators.name: SetApp
eventDecorators.description: Validator's status changed. Event emitted for each executed trade.

functionDecorators.name: getRecoveryVault
functionDecorators.description: Get the address of the recovery Vault instance (to recover funds).

functionDecorators.name: newAppInstance
functionDecorators.description: Create a new upgradeable instance of `_appId` app linked to the Kernel, setting its code to `_appBase`. `_setDefault ? 'Also sets it as the default app instance.':''`. Create a new instance of an app linked to this kernel and set its base implementation if it was not already set.

parameterDecorators.name: _appBase
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the app's base implementation.

parameterDecorators.name: _initializePayload
parameterDecorators.description: Payload for call made by the proxy during its construction to initialize.

parameterDecorators.name: _setDefault
parameterDecorators.description: Whether the app proxy app is the default one. Useful when the Kernel needs to know of an instance of a particular app, like Vault for escape hatch mechanism.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: Initialize this kernel instance along with its ACL and set `_permissionsCreator` as the entity that can create other permissions. Initialize can only be called once. It saves the block number in which it was initialized.

parameterDecorators.name: _permissionsCreator
parameterDecorators.description: Entity that will be given permission over createPermission.

functionDecorators.name: allowRecoverability
functionDecorators.description: By default deriving from AragonApp makes it recoverable.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: Token address that would be recovered.

functionDecorators.name: newAppInstance
functionDecorators.description: Create a new upgradeable instance of `_appId` app linked to the Kernel, setting its code to `_appBase`. Create a new instance of an app linked to this kernel.

parameterDecorators.name: _appBase
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the app's base implementation.

functionDecorators.name: setRecoveryVaultAppId
functionDecorators.description: Set the default vault id for the escape hatch mechanism.

parameterDecorators.name: _recoveryVaultAppId
parameterDecorators.description: Identifier of the recovery vault app.

functionDecorators.name: newPinnedAppInstance
functionDecorators.description: Create a new non-upgradeable instance of `_appId` app linked to the Kernel, setting its code to `_appBase`. Create a new pinned instance of an app linked to this kernel.

parameterDecorators.name: _appBase
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the app's base implementation.

functionDecorators.name: transferToVault
functionDecorators.description: Send funds to recovery Vault. This contract should never receive funds, but in case it does, this function allows one to recover them.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: Token balance to be sent to recovery vault.

functionDecorators.name: setApp
functionDecorators.description: Set the resolving address of `_appId` in namespace `_namespace` to `_app`. Set the resolving address of an app instance or base implementation.

parameterDecorators.name: _app
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the app instance or base implementation.

functionDecorators.name: getApp
functionDecorators.description: Get the address of an app instance or base implementation.

functionDecorators.name: newPinnedAppInstance
functionDecorators.description: Create a new non-upgradeable instance of `_appId` app linked to the Kernel, setting its code to `_appBase`. `_setDefault ? 'Also sets it as the default app instance.':''`. Create a new pinned instance of an app linked to this kernel and set its base implementation if it was not already set.

parameterDecorators.name: _appBase
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the app's base implementation.

parameterDecorators.name: _initializePayload
parameterDecorators.description: Payload for call made by the proxy during its construction to initialize.

parameterDecorators.name: _setDefault
parameterDecorators.description: Whether the app proxy app is the default one. Useful when the Kernel needs to know of an instance of a particular app, like Vault for escape hatch mechanism.

functionDecorators.name: newAppProxyPinned
functionDecorators.description: Create a new pinned app instance on `_kernel` with identifier `_appId` and initialization payload `_initializePayload`.

functionDecorators.name: newAppProxy
functionDecorators.description: Create a new upgradeable app instance on `_kernel` with identifier `_appId`.

functionDecorators.name: newAppProxy
functionDecorators.description: Create a new upgradeable app instance on `_kernel` with identifier `_appId` and initialization payload `_initializePayload`.

functionDecorators.name: hasPermission
functionDecorators.description: Function called by apps to check ACL on kernel or to check permission status.

parameterDecorators.name: _what
parameterDecorators.description: Identifier for a group of actions in app.

functionDecorators.name: newAppProxyPinned
functionDecorators.description: Create a new pinned app instance on `_kernel` with identifier `_appId`.
